Package reseau_petri

Class Petrinet

java.lang.Object
reseau_petri.Petrinet
public class Petrinet
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
IML A petrinet contains places and transitions. An arcs links a place and a transition together. When Petrinet runs, it pulls every pullable transition. When none of them are left, the running stops.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Petrinet()
    Default constructor : initializes a Petrinet without any places, transitions nor arcs.

      transition - Adds a transition to the petrinet.

      Parameters:

    • deleteTransition

      public void deleteTransition​(Transition transition)
      Parameters:
      transition - Removes a transition and its connected arcs from the petrinet.

      public void deletePlace​(Place place) throws java.lang.Exception
      Parameters:
      place -
      Throws:

    • addToken

      public void addToken​(Place place, int token)
      Parameters:

    • modifyArcValue

      public void modifyArcValue​(Arc arc, int newWeight)
      Parameters:
      arc -
      newWeight - Updates the weight of the selected arc.

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the petrinet : while there are transitions left, the petrinet pulls new transitions.

    • areTransitionsLeft

      public boolean areTransitionsLeft()
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean that shows whether or not there are remaining transitions to be pulled.
